TopicTitle: Ksp Crashes after a little bit on eva

Articles.Content: Almost every time on eva my game crashes. I deleted all my mods after this happened except kerbal engineer redux and i have the latest version of it. This has only started happening after i downloaded both dlcs. Before i deleted my mods, i had a 1.7 version of BD armory and physics range extender.

Sounds like this confirmed bug to me

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/23977
